name: VoidGate
storyline: They have demanded our exile; not to another land but to another world completely. We could fight and conquer, a war we could win easily. But it is not our way. Instead we find a new home, to do this we must enter into the Void. One of our volunteers will gain immortality, and we will have a way to create a new home using the magic of the Void.
summary: VoidGate is a third-person Diablo style dungeon crawling game. It consists of randomly generated dungeons, lite survival elements, and permanent death. The combat consists of strategic real-time action, using different styles of melee combat, ranged combat, and magic. There is no class system, as it allows absolute freedom of the player to choose their attributes, stats, and skills. However, there are some class archetypes for players who may want to choose a narrower suggested path.
